subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: keyboard map uploaded
msgSnippet: By the way, regarding my QS proposal in the files section: I think it should NOT include the half-letter as separate characters, but rather as alternate
messageBody:
By the way, regarding my QS proposal in the files section: I think it
should NOT include the half-letter as separate characters, but rather
as alternate glyphs. At the 'step' characters are really just a way of
writing ligatures, and also should not be included. I will update the
file soon, to reflect these changes.

oliver

By the way, regarding my QS proposal in the files section: I think it 
should NOT include the half-letter as separate characters, but rather 
as alternate glyphs.  At the 'step' characters are really just a way of 
writing ligatures, and also should not be included.  I will update the 
file soon, to reflect these changes.

oliver
